Description: Fragment of undyed linen plain weave; every 1.5cm is a pick of supplementary weft, grouped threads, to create a decorative line; two band of brocade have been applied in a right angle and sewn with oversewing in undyed linen; two bands have a red wool background and geometric, zig-zag and triangle motifs in undyed and green wool, small crosses in green and yellow wool; this is framed either side by a band of geometric motifs in undyed and yellow wool; the selvedge of the bands has been hemmed and sewn and the edges of the brocade and plain weave are cut and ragged; plain weave: warp-undyed linen (S/15), weft-undyed linen (S/17); brocade: warp-red, green and yellow wool (S spun Z ply/16), weft-red, undyed and yellow wool (S/paired or single/12); sewing: undyed linen (S spun Z ply)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
